141132121.content:
Sonic reflects on what's he done. He just knocked out Amy Rose. His potential love interest and the worst part is that he felt good about it or did he?

He wasn't sure anymore but he knew he needed to explain everything so he bought the knocked out Amy Rose to his bedroom upstairs and as he thinks, he remembers all the times he avoided Amy but remember just show how much of a coward he was because he couldn't afford to break Amy's heart.

He also thinks about Tikal who just came back to life.

She was nice, pretty and she didn't stalk him but that doesn't excuse the fact that he doesn't know her very well.

He had a choice, choose the girl who stalked him all his life or choose the girl he knows nothing about. He thought about it and he decided...
141132121.title: A hard choice

1411321211.content:
Sonic then suddenly feels a flow of memories in his head, these memories weren't of Amy's days as a stalker but as a passionate person and friend.

No scratch that, it wasn't as a friend but as something more, could it be...love? Sonic then realized that it was love.

He wondered why he ran all those times from her and it was clear. He was afraid. He was afraid of the girl who constantly proposed to him.

He was afraid that her obsession with him might doom a possible marriage. He was afraid over nothing.

He realized that he needed to push these thoughts out of his head and come out with his true feelings. He told himself that he was going to apologize to her.

He was no longer going to torment her with this game of "hard to get". He sat on his bed and Tikal came up and asked "Hey Sonic! Who was at the door?"

She looked and saw Amy lying on the bed and Sonic just asked "Could you leave us alone for a few minutes?"

Tikal simply smiled and said "Sure. No problem." That was that.

She realized that Sonic could never be hers because he loved someone else and she decided to support them.

Amy woke up and Sonic explained what happened. Sonic reared his face back for the slap he would feel but the slap never came.

She simply sat there dumb founded at what she just heard. Sonic then says "Also there's something else I want to tell you."

Amy snapped out of her daze to hear what Sonic has to say. Sonic begins "Amy I love you." With those four words, Amy was completely blown away.

She never thought that she'd hear those words come out of his mouth. She simply cried.

Sonic thought he did something wrong and was about to say something but it looked like Amy knew what he was going to say and replied "These aren't tears of sadness. These are tears of joy."

When she said that Sonic felt like a burden was lifted off of him. As time passed, Sonic's thoughts were screaming "Kiss her damn it!"

He did what his thoughts told and they kissed passionately for half an hour. She then said something that Sonic didn't expect to hear "Take me."

He simply granted her heart's desire and that as they say was that.
1411321211.title: Hidden feelings

14113212111.content:
Sonic and Amy got married about six years after they kissed for the first time.

Many of Sonic's friends attended the ceremony but the only person missing was Shadow but that's to be expected.

Tails now dates Cream after finding a new found love for her. Knuckles and Rouge are still in denial but Tikal is helping them in that department.

No one knows where Shadow is and the Chaotix finally scored enough money to get out of debt and they bought a nice house.

Vanilla decided to remarry and wedded Vector about a year after Sonic and Amy's first kiss.

They are currently doing fine and Charmy continues to annoy them despite being older now.

Espio disappeared after Sonic and Amy's wedding, no one knows where he went afterwards.

Eggman decided to give up the whole take over the world gig and took up a job coming with a cure to all the world's diseases.

He's so far found over one hundred new cures for different diseases.

Amazingly, Sliver and Blaze decided to attend the wedding too and they went back to the future afterwards.

As for Sonic and Amy, they now own a little safe haven for themselves.

They also had a child who Sonic decided to call Sonia after his sister who went missing.

Their daughter is now three years old. Everyone was living peacefully.

Meanwhile on the ark...

A mysterious figure looked out the window at the earth and he turned to the door behind him but not before saying "About time Faker.".

The End

Tails and Knuckles were properly mourned a month after Issac turned on them and Shadow was mourned two days after Zero's defeat.

Vanilla became the team nurse and and Cream helped.

Kate was heartbroken when she found out about Issac and even after what happened that day, She vows to change and bring him back.

Issac, now known as Lily, had sex with the new ruler of the world twenty times a month.

The fight raged on for twenty years but sadly, the Freedom Fighters were defeated by Jake's forces and executed but Kate was kept alive and forced to be Jake's second sex slave.

The world's hope was crushed and even to this very day, No one questioned their new ruler and it was said that the dark ruling lasted for eons to come.

The End

info.brief_description: Choose a girl or boy you want tied up or make a character for the story.
info.description: You are allowed to use any item you choose for bondage stories just as long as nobody (Except eggman and maybe tails and few others but no more than three can die in your story because it becomes a bloodshed then.) Other than that enjoy the stories you write and make it as cool as possible and maybe throw in a battle or two. I look forward to the stories I see and this will probably be my only creation but if you want more then I guess I'll think about it.(No gays but maybe lesbians but no gays.) New Rule! You can now kill Sonic or Knuckles if you want! I'm allowing transgendering now so go nuts and I'm now removing the only three people can die rule seeing as no one coming here anymore. You can have as many kills as you want now!
